pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed Models, Particularly Spatial GLMMs // Inference in mixed models, including GLMMs with spatial correlations and models with non-Gaussian random effects (e.g., Beta Binomial, or negative-binomial mixed models). Heteroscedasticity can further be fitted by a linear model. The algorithms are currently various Laplace approximations methods for ML or REML, in particular h-likelihood and penalized-likelihood methods.
